meanings.definition: A person who fritters away time or resources.
meanings.sent1: The fritterers in the office always spend hours chatting instead of working.
meanings.sent2: The group of fritterers at the park wasted the whole day lounging around.
meanings.sent3: The fritterers decided to play video games instead of studying for their exams.
meanings.sent4: She was a fritterer of opportunities, letting them slip through her fingers.
meanings.sent5: The fritterers were like sand slipping through an hourglass, never achieving anything substantial.

meanings.definition: Plural form of fritterer, referring to multiple individuals who fritter away time or resources.
meanings.sent1: The fritterers in the group always choose the easiest tasks to avoid real work.
meanings.sent2: When the fritterers gathered, they would always find ways to procrastinate.
meanings.sent3: The fritterers turned a simple project into a week-long ordeal.
meanings.sent4: Their team was a collection of fritterers, never completing anything on time.
meanings.sent5: The fritterers were like bees buzzing around, never settling on one task for long.
